title: Like A Boy
lyrics:
I saw you looking at me I was looking at you too
Is there somewhere we could go where we could be alone
You are a butterfly and I am a butterfly and we are two butterflies just hanging in the summer wind
What did you say to me I thought I heard you say something to me…but maybe I was wrong
And if I can I will be yours for all time
Why do we do this to ourselves when I love you so damn much and you love me so damn much
What can your father do I hate it when he treats me like a boy
